name: Emerging Big Data Technologies Summit 2016 (EBDTS'16)
content: The first Emerging Big Data Technologies Summit (EBDTS), (http://ebdts16.org/), will be held in Melbourne, Australia from 7 to 9 December 2016\. The summit is chaired by Prof. Dacheng Tao (University of Technology Sydney) who is one of the world’s most influential computer scientists, the winner of the 2015 Eureka prize and ICT researcher of the year (Australian Computer Society). The event is hosted by the International Innovative Research Network. EBDTS’16 will bring together key researchers from our region and around the world to share the latest advances in big data technologies development. The summit will cover all areas of data analytics, spreading across a wide range of topics such as computer vision, computational neuroscience, data science, geoinformatics, image processing, machine learning, medical informatics, multimedia, neural networks and video surveillance.
